mapper.select: SELECT parent_article_id FROM MA1200 WHERE (SELECT sp_value FROM CM9060 WHERE sp_id = '0000') BETWEEN effective_start_date AND effective_end_date

SELECT T.parent_article_id AS k, CONCAT(T1.article_id, ' ', T1.article_name) AS v FROM MA1200 T JOIN ( SELECT M.article_id, M.article_name FROM MA1100 M, MA1140 M1 WHERE M1.is_default = '1' AND M.article_id = M1.article_id AND M.effective_start_date = M1.effective_start_date AND (SELECT sp_value FROM CM9060 WHERE sp_id = '0000') BETWEEN M.effective_start_date AND M.effective_end_date AND ( LOWER(M.article_id) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%',#{v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) OR LOWER(M.article_name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%',#{v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) ) ) T1 ON T.parent_article_id = T1.article_id WHERE (SELECT sp_value FROM CM9060 WHERE sp_id = '0000') BETWEEN T.effective_start_date AND T.effective_end_date
SELECT formula_id as parent_article_id FROM MA1170 WHERE (SELECT sp_value FROM CM9060 WHERE sp_id = '0000') BETWEEN effective_start_date AND effective_end_date
